ygData.subject: Re: back after 3 months and need some help
ygData.msgSnippet: A lot of them are available from the server selection screen.  If you click on news, it will give you the updates going back quite a while.  Farther back than
ygData.messageBody:
A lot of them are available from the server selection screen. If you click
on news, it will give you the updates going back quite a while. Farther
back than that, though, I'm not sure. You could try the official Everquest
site; they might have some older ones. And you can also try Everquest
Stratics. They have archived news. If you scroll down to the very bottom
of their main page, there is a link to archived news. I don't know how far
back it goes, but the last time I needed to look something up I seem to
remember it going back several months. Their pages always list the updates
that the patch server prints out, so you might find them all there. They
are at http://eqss.stratics.com/ Hope this helps.

JW


----- Original Message -----
From: James Blanchard <Redevil001@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 8:16 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] back after 3 months and need some help


> From: "James Blanchard" <Redevil001@...>
>
> I went away for the summer and am finally back, but to my regret, when I
> updated my EQ, it only listed the most recent updates and I have no clue
> what has gone on in the past 3 months! I also decided to join a pvp-teams
> server but I don't even know the teams! Anyone know where I could get a
list
> of all the updates? Thanks, Lott.
>
